## HSL.darken() method

Darken the color.

Can either be a number or a string which represents a percentage.

```ts
const hsl = HSL.create('hsl(180, 50%, 50%)')
color.darken(50).l // => 25
color.darken('25%').l // => 37.5

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
darken(percent: number | string): HSL;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  percent | <code>number &#124; string</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`HSL`
